Name: Theory Of Fundamental Processes (Advanced Books Classics)

ReviewList.Text: As a Feynman fan and layperson with a reasonable understanding of his work I found this book lost me before I was halfway into the first chapter. It looks good coursework material and from what I can tell is packed with  amazing amounts of information. But without a strong fundamental grounding  in basic physics this book will remain on your bookshelf.
This is graduate/research level material - but Feynman explains like he was teaching undergrads!  This is one reason Feynman was a true genious!
